goals__remit: Continental develops pioneering technologies and services for sustainable and connected mobility of people and their goods. Founded in 1871, the technology company offers safe, efficient, intelligent and affordable solutions for vehicles, machines, traffic and transport. In 2017, Continental generated sales of €44 billion and currently employs more than 235,000 people in 61 countries.
relevant_communication: Demonstration events, debates, consultations and meetings with EU stakeholders regarding the topics mentioned in the previous section
